entries.name: Flask
entries.description: A flask holds 1 pint of liquid.

entries.name: 성수(Flask of Holy Water)
entries.description: 당신은 행동을 사용하여 이 약병의 액체를 5ft 이내의 크리쳐에게 뿌리거나 20ft까지 던질 수 있으며, 충격을 받으면 병은 깨집니다. 어느 쪽이든 당신은 약병을 임기응변 무기로 취급해 목표에게 장거리 공격을 행합니다. 만약 목표가 악마 또는 언데드라면, 명중시 2d6점의 광휘 피해를 받습니다.

entries.name: Flute
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Folding Boat
entries.description:
Wondrous item

This object appears as a wooden box that measures 12 inches long, 6 inches wide, and 6 inches deep. It weighs 4 pounds and floats. It can be opened to store items inside. This item also has three command words, each requiring you to use an action to speak it.

One command word causes the box to unfold into a boat 10 feet long, 4 feet wide, and 2 feet deep. The boat has one pair of oars, an anchor, a mast, and a lateen sail. The boat can hold up to four Medium creatures comfortably.

The second command word causes the box to unfold into a ship 24 feet long, 8 feet wide, and 6 feet deep. The ship has a deck, rowing seats, five sets of oars, a steering oar, an anchor, a deck cabin, and a mast with a square sail. The ship can hold fifteen Medium creatures comfortably.

When the box becomes a vessel, its weight becomes that of a normal vessel its size, and anything that was stored in the box remains in the boat.

The third command word causes the folding boat to fold back into a box, provided that no creatures are aboard. Any objects in the vessel that can't fit inside the box remain outside the box as it folds. Any objects in the vessel that can fit inside the box do so.

entries.name: 위조 키트(Forgery Kit)
entries.description: 이 작은 상자 안에는 다양한 종이와 양피지가 들어 있으며, 펜과 잉크, 인장과 밀랍, 금이나 은으로 만들어진 핀, 기타 문서를 위조할 때 필요한 도구들이 들어 있습니다. 이 도구에 숙련이 있으면 문서를 위조하고자 할 때 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다

entries.name: Frost Brand Greatsword
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In addition, while you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

entries.name: Frost Brand Rapier
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In addition, while you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

entries.name: Frost Brand Scimitar
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In addition, while you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

entries.name: Frost Brand Shortsword
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

When you hit with an attack using this magic sword, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. In addition, while you hold the sword, you have resistance to fire damage.

In freezing temperatures, the blade sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

When you draw this weapon, you can extinguish all nonmagical flames within 30 feet of you. This property can be used no more than once per hour.

entries.name: 게임 세트(Gaming Set)
entries.description: 이 세트는 주사위나 (용 세 마리 놀이 용 등등을 위한) 카드 등과 같은 다양한 게임 도구들이 포함되어 있습니다. 평범한 것들은 도구 표에도 나와 있지만, 다른 게임 세트들 역시 존재합니다. 게임 세트에 숙련을 지니고 있다면, 그 세트를 이용한 게임을 할 때 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다. 게임 세트들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Glaive
entries.description: A crescent blade is mounted on the end of a tall metal shaft. This polearm provies the ability to attack with deadly efficiency from greater range than typical melee weapons.

entries.name: Glass Bottle
entries.description: A bottle holds 1½ pints of liquid.

entries.name: 유리제작자의 도구(Glassblower's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: 등반용 갈고리(Grappling Hook)
entries.description: 철제 갈퀴가 달린 장치로, 밧줄과 함께 당기거나 붙잡는 용도로 사용할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: Greataxe
entries.description:
This enormous axe features two twin crescent blades mounted on either side of a tall spiked shaft. Designed to be wielded with two hands and cleave foes in twain.

Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.

Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapon, not when you simply hold it.

entries.name: Greatclub
entries.description: A larger variant of the simple club, a hefty wooden shaft with an enormous knot of wood upon the end deals crippling bludgeoning damage to unfortunate foes.

entries.name: Greatsword
entries.description: A mighty two-handed blade is over four feet long an almost five inches wide. This weapon requires extensive martial training but those proficient in its use are formidable warriors.

entries.name: Halberd
entries.description: A spear-tipped metal shaft accompanied by a crescent blade, the halberd is a strong defensive weapon which allows a warrior to fend off foes using the reach of the shaft to attack from safe distance.

entries.name: Half Plate Armor
entries.description: Half plate consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It does not include leg protection beyond simple greaves that are attached with leather straps.

entries.name: Half Plate Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Half Plate Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Half Plate Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Half Plate Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: Hammer
entries.description: A tool with heavy metal head mounted ar the right angles at the end of a handle, used for job such as breaking things and driving in nails.

entries.name: Hand Crossbow
entries.description: A lightweight crossbow designed to be held in one hand or strapped to one's wrist to fire light bolts.

entries.name: Handaxe
entries.description: This one-handed axe is light and balanced for throwing while remaining useful in hand combat.

entries.name: 치유사의 키트(Healer's Kit)
entries.description: 이 키트는 붕대와 연고, 부목이 포함된 가죽 주머니로 이루어져 있습니다. 이 키트는 10회 사용할 수 있습니다. 당신은 행동을 사용하여 키트의 내용물 1회분을 써서 hp 0의 크리쳐 하나를 지혜(의학) 판정 없이 안정화시킬 수 있습니다.

entries.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries.description: A large crossbow mounted on a sturdy block of wood which is loaded using a hand crank and fires thick steel bolts with deadly acceleration that punches through armor and flesh.

entries.name: 마 로프(Hempen Rope) (50ft)
entries.description: 마로 만든 것이든 비단으로 만든 것이든 로프는 2점의 hp를 지니며, DC 17 근력 판정에 성공하면 끊을 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 약초학 키트(Herbalism Kit)
entries.description: 이 키트에는 가위와 막자, 공이, 다양한 약병이나 주머니 등등 물약이나 치료제를 만들기 위한 약초학 용구가 포함되어 있습니다. 이 도구에 숙련을 지니고 있으면 약초를 식별하거나 수집하기 위한 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다. 또한, 당신이 해독제나 치유의 물약을 제작할 때도 이 도구에 대한 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Hide Armor
entries.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

entries.name: Hide Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Hide Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Hide Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Hide Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: 덮개 랜턴(Hooded Lantern)
entries.description: 덮개 랜턴은 주변 30ft 반경을 밝은 빛 환경으로, 추가로 30ft까지는 약한 빛 환경으로 밝힙니다. 일단 밝히며 기름 한 병으로 6시간 정도를 사용할 수 있습니다. 당신은 행동을 사용하여 덮개를 내릴 수 있으며, 그러면 주위 5ft 반경에 약한 빛 환경으로 밝히는 것 외에는 조명이 차단됩니다.

entries.name: Horn
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Hourglass
entries.description: It is a device used to measure the psaage of time. It comprises two glass bulbs connected vertically by a narrow neck that allows a regulated trickle of sand from the upper bulb to the lower one.

entries.name: Hunting Trap
entries.description: When you use your action to set it, this trap forms a saw-toothed steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d4 piercing damage and stop moving. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet long). A creature can use its action to make a DC 13 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 piercing damage to the trapped creature.

entries.name: Ink Bottle
entries.description: A small bottle of ink for writing upon parchment.

entries.name: Ink Pen
entries.description: A deviced used in combination with ink to write or draw on a sheet of paper.

entries.name: Iron Pot
entries.description: An iron pot holds 1 gallon of liquid.

entries.name: Iron Spikes
entries.description: Spikes of 10 inches long made of iron.

entries.name: Javelin
entries.description: This light and flexible spear is designed for throwing, but is versatile enough to be used in melee combat as well.

entries.name: 보석세공사의 도구(Jeweler's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Jug
entries.description: A jug holds 1 gallon of liquid.

entries.name: Ladder (10-foot)
entries.description: Ladder (10-foot)

entries.name: 램프(Lamp)
entries.description: 램프는 불을 밝혔을 때 주변 15ft까지를 밝은 빛 환경으로, 추가로 30ft까지를 약한 빛 환경으로 밝힙니다. 일단 밝히면, 기름 한 병으로 6시간 정도를 사용할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: Leather Armor
entries.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

entries.name: Leather Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Leather Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Leather Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Leather Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: 무두장이의 도구(Leatherworker's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Light Crossbow
entries.description: A small crossbow with a wooden haft and a tense cord which is capable of firing a single bolt which can puncture even heavy armor at close range.

entries.name: Light Hammer
entries.description:
This sturdy hammer is small enough to be nimbly wielded or used in combination with another weapon.

Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handle, making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.

Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown property, you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapon, you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For example, if you throw a handaxe, you use your Strength, but if you throw a dagger, you can use either your Strength or your Dexterity, since the dagger has the finesse property.

entries.name: Lock
entries.description: A key is provided with the lock. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick this lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Your DM may decide that better locks are available for higher prices.

entries.name: Longbow
entries.description: A thick shaft of laminated wood is bowed by a taut string capable of launching deadly arrows at long distances.

entries.name: Longsword
entries.description: A lengthy stright blade designed for slashing foes, the longsword is a highly versatile weapon that may also be wielded with two hands for more punishing strikes.

entries.name: Lute
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Lyre
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Mace
entries.description: A heavy bludgeoning weapon mounted to the end of a metal club. The head features spikes and blades designed to puncture armor and shatter the bones below.

entries.name: Magnifying Glass
entries.description: This lens allows a closer look at small objects. It is also useful as a substitute for flint and steel when starting fires. Lighting a fire with a magnifying glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite. A magnifying glass grants advantage on any ability check made to appraise or inspect an item that is small or highly detailed.

entries.name: Manacles
entries.description: These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. Escaping the manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check. Breaking them requires a successful DC 20 Strength check. Each set of manacles comes with one key. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick the manacles' lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Manacles have 15 hit points.

entries.name: 지도나 두루마리 통(Map or Scroll Case)
entries.description: 이 원통형 가죽 통은 10개까지의 말린 종이나 5개까지의 양피지를 넣어 보관할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 석공의 도구(Mason's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Maul
entries.description: This heavy two-handed mace crushes metal and bone with thunderous force.

entries.name: Merchant's Scale
entries.description: A scale includes a small balance, pans, and a suitable assortment of weights up to 2 pounds. With it, you can measure the exact weight of small objects, such as raw precious metals or trade goods, to help determine their worth.

entries.name: 요리 도구(Mess Kit)
entries.description: 이 양철 상자는 컵과 간단한 조리 도구들이 들어 있습니다. 상자는 같이 접어 넣을 수 있으며, 한쪽 면은 요리용 팬으로, 반대편은 식판이나 얕은 그릇으로 쓸 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 광부의 곡괭이(Miner's Pick)
entries.description: 단단한 머리 부분이 손잡이에 수직으로 부착된 공구입니다.

entries.name: Morningstar
entries.description: A viciously spiked metal orb mounted upon the end of a stout haft makes for a deadly weapon which can puncture armor and flesh alike.

entries.name: 악기(Musical Instrument)
entries.description: 도구 표에는 가장 널리 사용되는 악기들이 나와 있습니다. 해당 악기에 대해 숙련을 지니고 있다면, 당신은 악기를 연주할 때 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 바드는 악기를 주문시전 도구로 사용할 수 있으며, 이에 대한 규칙은 제10장에 나와 있습니다. 각각의 악기마다 따로 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: 항해사의 도구(Navigator’s Tools)
entries.description: 이 도구들은 바다에서 방향을 가늠할 때 사용하는 것들입니다. 항해사의 도구에 숙련을 지니고 있으면 배의 진로를 잡고 운항할 수 있습니다. 또한 이 도구에 숙련이 있으면 바다에서 길을 잃지 않기 위해 능력 판정을 할 때 능력 판정에 숙련보너스를 더할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 그물(Net)
entries.description:
대형 크기 이하의 크리쳐가 그물에 명중한 경우, 풀려나기 전까지 포박 상태가 됩니다. 형체가 없거나 거대 크기 이상의 크리쳐에게는 그물은 아무 효과가 없습니다. 그물에 포박된 크리쳐는 행동을 사용하고 DC 10의 근력 판정을 하여 풀려날 수 있으며, 주변에 접근한 다른 크리쳐 역시 동일한 판정을 하여 풀어줄 수 있습니다. 그물(AC 10)에 5점의 참격 피해를 가하면 포박된 크리쳐에게 해를 가하지 않고 그물을 찢을 수 있으며, 그렇게 되면 포박 상태는 종료됩니다.

당신이 행동, 추가 행동, 반응행동을 사용해 그물로 공격을 가할 때, 실제로 당신이 여러 번 공격할 수 있더라도 그물로는 오직 한 번의 공격만 가할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 기름(Oil Flask)
entries.description: 기름은 대개 1파인트들이 점토 물병으로 판매됩니다. 당신은 행동을 사용하여 5ft 내의 목표에게 뿌리거나 20ft까지 던질 수 있으며, 병은 충격을 받으면 깨집니다. 어느 쪽이든, 당신은 기름을 임기응변 무기로 취급해 장거리 공격을 가합니다. 명중하면 목표는 기름에 뒤덮이게 됩니다. 만약 이후 목표가 기름이 마르기 전에 화염 피해를 받게 되면, 기름이 불타오르며 추가로 5점의 화염 피해를 입게 됩니다. (기름이 마르는 데는 1분이 걸립니다.) 또한, 당신은 기름을 5 × 5ft의 평평한 땅에 뿌릴 수 있습니다. 이렇게 땅에 뿌린 다음 불을 붙이면, 기름은 2라운드간 불타며 해당 지역에 들어오거나 그 턴에서 자기 턴을 끝마친 크리쳐에게 5점의 화염 피해를 가합니다. 이 화염 피해는 라운드당 1번만 가해집니다.

entries.name: Oil of Etherealness
entries.description:
Beads of this cloudy gray oil form on the outside of its container and quickly evaporate. 

The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it’s wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium).  Applying the oil takes 10 minutes.  The affected creature then gains the effect of the Etherealness (SRD 140) spell for 1 hour.

entries.name: Oil of Sharpness
entries.description:
This clear, gelatinous oil sparkles with tiny, ultrathin silver shards. 

The oil can coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to 5 pieces of slashing or piercing ammunition. Applying the oil takes 1 minute. For 1 hour, the coated item is magical and has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Oil of Slipperiness
entries.description:
This sticky black unguent is thick and heavy in the container, but it flows quickly when poured. 

The oil can cover a Medium or smaller creature, along with the equipment it’s wearing and carrying (one additional vial is required for each size category above Medium).  Applying the oil takes 10 minutes.  The affected creature then gains the effect of a freedom of movement spell for 8 hours.

Alternatively, the oil can be poured on the ground as an action, where it covers a 10‑foot square, duplicating the effect of the Grease (SRD 150) spell in that area for 8 hours.

entries.name: Padded Armor
entries.description: Padded armor consists of quilted layers of cloth and batting. Padded armor offers a comparable level of protection as stiffened leather but is somewhat less encumbering to the wearer.

entries.name: Padded Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Padded Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Padded Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Padded Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: 화가의 도구(Painter's Supplies)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Pan Flute
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Paper
entries.description: A single sheet of Paper.

entries.name: Parchment
entries.description: A single sheet of heavier parchment paper.

entries.name: Perfume
entries.description: A vial of aromatic perfume.

entries.name: Philter of Love
entries.description:
This potion’s rose-hued, effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

The next time you see a creature within 10 minutes after drinking this philter, you become charmed by that creature for 1 hour. If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted to, you  regard it as your true love while you are charmed.

entries.name: Pike
entries.description:
A sturdy blade mounted upon the end of a long metal haft. Designed as a defensive weapon with considerable reach to both fend off and menace foes.

Heavy. Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons. A heavy weapon's size and bulk make it too large for a Small creature to use effectively.

Reach. This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it. This property also determines your reach for opportunity attacks with a reach weapon.

Two-Handed. This weapon requires two hands to use. This property is relevant only when you attack with the weapon, not when you simply hold it.

entries.name: Pitcher
entries.description: A pitcher holds 1 gallon of liquid.

entries.name: Piton
entries.description: A metal spike that is drive into a crack of seam in the climbing surface with a climbing hammer.

entries.name: Plate Armor
entries.description: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

entries.name: Plate Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Plate Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Plate Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Plate Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: 독 제작자의 도구(Poisoner’s Kit)
entries.description: 독 제작자의 도구에는 여러 가지 약병과 화합물, 기타 독을 제조하는데 필요한 물품이 포함되어 있습니다. 이 도구에 숙련이 있으면 독을 만들거나 사용할 때의 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다.

entries.name: Pole
entries.description: A ten-foot long pole of sturdy wood.

entries.name: 휴대용 파성추(Portable Ram)
entries.description: 이 커다란 파성추는 문을 파괴하는데 사용할 수 있습니다. 이를 사용하면 문을 파괴하기 위한 근력 판정에 +4 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다. 다른 캐릭터 한 명이 파성추를 사용하는 데 도움을 준다면 판정에 이점을 받을 수 있습니다.

entries.name: Potion of Acid Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Acidic type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Animal Friendship
entries.description:
Agitating this muddy liquid brings little bits into view: a fish scale,    hummingbird tongue, a cat claw, or a squirrel hair.

When you drink this potion, you can cast the Animal Friendship (SRD 115)  spell (save DC 13) for 1 hour at will.

entries.name: Potion of Clairvoyance
entries.description:
An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Clairvoyance (SRD 124) spell.

entries.name: Potion of Climbing
entries.description:
The potion is separated into brown, silver, and gray layers resembling bands of stone. Shaking the bottle fails to mix the colors.

When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb.

entries.name: Potion of Cloud Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 27 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Cold Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to cold type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Diminution
entries.description:
The red in the potion’s liquid continuously contracts to a tiny bead and then expands to color the clear liquid around it.  Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

When you drink this potion, you gain the “reduce” effect of the Enlarge/Reduce (SRD 140) spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required).

entries.name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 25 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Fire Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to fire type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Flying
entries.description:
This potion’s clear liquid floats at the top of its container and has cloudy white impurities drifting in it.

When you drink this potion, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour and can hover. If you’re in the air when the potion wears off, you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft.

entries.name: Potion of Force Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Force type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Gaseous Form
entries.description:
This potion’s container seems to hold fog that moves and pours like water.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Gaseous Form (SRD 148) spell for 1 hour (no concentration required) or until you end the effect as a bonus action.

entries.name: Potion of Greater Healing
entries.description:
Agitating the potion the red liquid glimmers with it's motion.

You regain 4d4+4 hit points when you drink this potion.

entries.name: Potion of Growth
entries.description:
The red in the potion’s liquid continuously expands from a tiny bead to color the clear liquid around it and then contracts.  Shaking the bottle fails to interrupt this process.

When you drink this potion, you gain the “enlarge” effect of the Enlarge/Reduce (SRD 140) spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required).

entries.name: Potion of Healing
entries.description:
Agitating the potion the red liquid glimmers with it's motion.

You regain 2d4+2 hit points when you drink this potion.

entries.name: Potion of Heroism
entries.description:
This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

For 1 hour after drinking it, you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the Bless (SRD 122) spell (no concentration required)

entries.name: Potion of Hill Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Invisibility
entries.description:
This potion’s container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. 

When you drink it, you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

entries.name: Potion of Lightning Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Lightning type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Mind Reading
entries.description:
The potion’s dense, purple liquid has an ovoid cloud of pink floating in it.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Detect Thoughts (SRD 135) spell (save DC 13).

entries.name: Potion of Necrotic Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Necrotic type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Poison
entries.description:
This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a potion of healing or other beneficial potion.

However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic.  An identify spell reveals its true nature.

If you drink it, you take 3d6 poison damage, and you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. At the start of each of your turns while you are poisoned in this way, you take 3d6 poison damage. At the end of each of your turns, you can repeat the saving throw. On a successful save, the poison damage you take on your subsequent turns decreases by 1d6. The poison ends when the damage decreases to 0.

entries.name: Potion of Poison Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Poison type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Psychic Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Psychic type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Radiant Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Radiant type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Speed
entries.description:
The potion’s yellow fluid is streaked with black and swirls on its own.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the Haste (SRD 153) spell for 1 minute (no concentration required).

entries.name: Potion of Stone Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Storm Giant Strength
entries.description:
This potion’s transparent liquid has floating in it a sliver of fingernail from a giant of the appropriate type.

When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 29 for 1 hour.  The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

entries.name: Potion of Superior Healing
entries.description:
Agitating the potion the red liquid glimmers with it's motion.

You regain 8d4+8 hit points when you drink this potion.

entries.name: Potion of Supreme Healing
entries.description:
Agitating the potion the red liquid glimmers with it's motion.

You regain 10d4+20 hit points when you drink this potion.

entries.name: Potion of Thunder Resistance
entries.description:
The potion is a plain indescriminate color and smells slightly foul.

When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to Thunder type of damage for 1 hour.

entries.name: Potion of Water Breathing
entries.description:
Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion.

entries.name: 도기 제작자의 도구(Potter's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Pouch
entries.description: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to ⅕ cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

entries.name: Quarterstaff
entries.description: A thick shaft of wood wrapped with a sturdy grip makes a highly functional weapon in addition to a stout walking stick.

entries.name: Quiver
entries.description: A quiver can hold up to 20 arrows.

entries.name: Rain Catcher
entries.description: A rain catcher is a simple contraption consisting of a 5-foot-square leather tarp and a wooden frame with legs. When the tarp is stretched across the wooden frame, it forms a basin that can catch 2 gallons of drinking water per inch of rainfall and hold up to 8 gallons. The tarp and wooden frame fold up for easy transport.

entries.name: Rapier
entries.description: A thin tensile metal blade, light in weight but long in reach designed for quick darting attacks to target weak points in enemy defenses with lightning swiftness.

entries.name: 휴대식량(Rations)
entries.description: 휴대식량은 장거리 여행에 필요한 건조된 음식들이며, 육포, 말린 과일, 견과류, 비스킷 등을 포함하고 있습니다.

entries.name: Ring Mail
entries.description: This armor is leather armor with heavy rings sewn into it. The rings help reinforce the armor against blows from swords and axes. Ring mail is inferior to chain mail, and it's usually worn only by those who can't afford better armor.

entries.name: Ring Mail +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Ring Mail +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Ring Mail +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Ring Mail Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: Rod
entries.description:
An intricately carved or shaped rod of bone, stone, metal, or more exotic materials. Such rods are used by spellcasters to focus their attention and arcane energy.

Spellcasting Focus. An arcane focus is a special item designed to channel the power of arcane spells. A sorcerer, warlock, or wizard can use such an item as a spellcasting focus, using it in place of any material component which does not list a cost.

entries.name: Sack
entries.description: A sack can hold up to 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

entries.name: Scale Mail
entries.description: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

entries.name: Scale Mail +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Scale Mail +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Scale Mail +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Scale Mail Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: Scimitar
entries.description: This curved blade is wide near the wrapped handle but arcs and tapers towards a gleaming tip.

entries.name: Sealing Wax
entries.description: A wax material of a seal wich, after melting, hardens quickly forming a bond that is difficult to separate without noticeable tampering.

entries.name: Shawm
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Shield
entries.description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

entries.name: Shortbow
entries.description: This two handed bow is somewhat smaller than the traditional longbow variant, making it well suited for rapid attacks while on the move or mounted from horseback.

entries.name: Shortsword
entries.description: A medium sized blade with a firm crossguard and a leather-wrapped handle. A versatile weapon which makes up in versatility what it lacks in reach.

entries.name: Shovel
entries.description: A tool resembling a spade with a broad blade and typically upturned sides, used for moving coals, earth, snow or other material.

entries.name: Sickle
entries.description:
A crescent hooked blade mounted atop a short haft, light enough to be wielded in one hand for treshing crops or foes.

Light. A light weapon is small and easy to handle, making it ideal for use when fighting with two weapons.

entries.name: Signal Whistle
entries.description: A whistle can produce specific noise. It can be heard half mile away.

entries.name: Signet Ring
entries.description: A ring with specific design to denote membership and rank within a house or organization.

entries.name: Silk Rope (50 feet)
entries.description: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

entries.name: Sledgehammer
entries.description: A tool with a large, flat, often metal head, attached to a long handle.

entries.name: Sling
entries.description:
A flexible lash of leather affixed to a wooden handle which is capable of flinging rocks or metal bullets with deadly velocity.

Range. A weapon that can be used to make a ranged attack has a range shown in parentheses after the ammunition or thrown property. The range lists two numbers. The first is the weapon's normal range in feet, and the second indicates the weapon's maximum range. When attacking a target beyond normal range, you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can't attack a target beyond the weapon's long range.

Ammunition. You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. Loading a one-handed weapon requires a free hand. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon. A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

entries.name: Sling Bullet
entries.description: A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling.

entries.name: Sling Bullet
entries.description: A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling.

entries.name: Sling Bullet +1
entries.description:
A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling. It has been imbued with magic.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

entries.name: Sling Bullet +2
entries.description:
A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling. It has been imbued with magic.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

entries.name: Sling Bullet +3
entries.description:
A hardened pebble of stone, bone, or metal which can be flung at high velocity using a sling. It has been imbued with magic.

You have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this piece of magic ammunition. Once it hits a target, the ammunition is no longer magical.

entries.name: Sling Bullet of Slaying
entries.description:
A Bullet of Slaying is a magic weapon meant to slay a particular kind of creature. Some are more focused than others; for example, there are both Bullets of Dragon Slaying and Bullets of Blue Dragon Slaying. If a creature belonging to the type, race, or group associated with a Bullet of Slaying takes damage from the bullet, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an extra 6d10 bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much extra damage on a successful one.

Once a Bullet of Slaying deals its extra damage to a creature, it becomes a nonmagical bullet.

entries.name: 대장장이의 도구(Smith's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Soap
entries.description: Used to clean and wash.

entries.name: Spear
entries.description: A gleaming steel point mouted atop a stout wooden haft, the spear may be wielded in one hand or two and can puncture through the heaviest armor with deadly force.

entries.name: Spellbook
entries.description: Essential for wizards, a spellbook is a leather-bound tome with 100 blank vellum pages suitable for recording spells.

entries.name: Spiked Armor
entries.description: Spiked armor is a rare type of medium armor made by dwarves. It consists of a leather coat and leggings covered with spikes that are usually made of metal.

entries.name: Splint Armor
entries.description: This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible chain mail protects the joints.

entries.name: Splint Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Splint Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Splint Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Splint Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: Spyglass
entries.description: Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

entries.name: Staff
entries.description:
A gnarled or polished staff of wood, bone, or more exotic materials like crystal. Such implements are frequently used by spellcasters to hone their arcane focus.

Spellcasting Focus. An arcane focus is a special item designed to channel the power of arcane spells. A sorcerer, warlock, or wizard can use such an item as a spellcasting focus, using it in place of any material component which does not list a cost.

entries.name: Steel Mirror
entries.description: Mirror made of steel.

entries.name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
entries.description:
Wondrous item

If the stone is touching the ground, you can use an action to speak the stone's command word and summon an @Compendium[dnd5e.monsters.sApYLZj9PTZ40wJr]{Earth Elemental}, as if you had cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.1LkZvINag7KqBmDR]{Conjure Elemental} spell. The stone can't be used this way again until the next dawn.

The stone weighs 5 pounds.

entries.name: Studded Leather Armor
entries.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

entries.name: Studded Leather Armor +1
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Studded Leather Armor +2
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Studded Leather Armor +3
entries.description:
This armor has been embellished with powerful runes, crafted in sorcerous fires, blessed by a powerful being, or some other event has seen it bequeathed with enhanced protection for the wearer.

You have a bonus to AC while wearing this armor.

entries.name: Studded Leather Armor of Resistance
entries.description:
(Requires attunement)

You have resistance to one type of damage while you wear this armor. The GM chooses the type or determines it randomly from the options below.

d10 Damage Type
1 Acid
2 Cold
3 Fire
4 Force
5 Lightning
6 Necrotic
7 Poison
8 Psychic
9 Radiant
10 Thunder

entries.name: Tankard
entries.description: It is a form of drinkware consisting of a large, roughly cynlindrical, drinking cup with a single handle.

entries.name: 도둑 도구(Thieves’ Tools)
entries.description: 이 도구에는 작은 쇠줄, 자물쇠 따개, 금속 손잡이가 달린 소형 거울, 가느다란 가위, 한 쌍의 집게 따위가 포함되어 있습니다. 이 도구에 숙련을 지니고 있으면 당신은 함정을 해체하거나 자물쇠를 열 때 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 받을 수 있습니다.

entries.name: 부싯깃통(Tinderbox)
entries.description: 이 작은 용기는 불을 붙이기 위한 부싯돌과 쇠판, 그리고 불쏘시개들로 이루어져 있습니다. (불쏘시개들은 주로 기름에 적신 천조각들입니다.) 이것을 가지고 행동을 사용하면 횃불이나 다른 준비된 연료에 불을 붙일 수 있습니다. 반면 다른 가연성 물질에 불을 붙이는 데는 1분이 필요합니다

entries.name: 땜장이의 도구(Tinker's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: 횃불(Torch)
entries.description: 횃불은 1시간 동안 불을 밝히며, 주변 20ft 반경을 밝은 빛 환경으로, 추가로 20ft 반경까지는 약한 빛 환경으로 밝힙니다. 만약 당신이 불타는 횃불로 근접 공격을 가하면, 명중시 1점의 화염 피해를 가합니다.

entries.name: 여행자의 복장(Traveler's Clothes
entries.description: 여행자들이 입는 옷 한 벌입니다.

entries.name: Trident
entries.description:
A multi-pronged spear designed to impale a target in multiple locations, pinning them in place. Often used in combination with a net to entrap and harass foes.

Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown property, you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapon, you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For example, if you throw a handaxe, you use your Strength, but if you throw a dagger, you can use either your Strength or your Dexterity, since the dagger has the finesse property.

Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Trinket
entries.description: PHB page 159

entries.name: Two-Person Tent
entries.description: A simple and portable canvas shelter, a tent sleeps two.

entries.name: Vial
entries.description: A vial can hold up to 4 ounces of liquid.

entries.name: Viol
entries.description: Several of the most common types of musical instruments are shown on the table as examples. If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument. A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus. Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

entries.name: Wand
entries.description:
A single-handed delicate implement of wood, bone, crystal, or other exotic materials which is commonly used as a focus to assist with arcane spellcasting.

Spellcasting Focus. An arcane focus is a special item designed to channel the power of arcane spells. A sorcerer, warlock, or wizard can use such an item as a spellcasting focus, using it in place of any material component which does not list a cost.

entries.name: War Pick
entries.description: A brutal curved spike mounted on the back of a sturdy haft - designed for puncturing armor with deadly force.

entries.name: Warhammer
entries.description:
A heavy metal hammer capable of being wielded with a single hand with a shield or in two hands to deliver crushing concussive blows.

Versatile. This weapon can be used with one or two hands. A damage value in parentheses appears with the property—the damage when the weapon is used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: 가죽물통(Waterskin)
entries.description: 4파인트의 액체를 담을 수 있는, 에워싼 형태로 재봉된 가죽입니다.

entries.name: 직조공의 도구(Weaver's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Whetstone
entries.description: Whetstone is a sharpening stone. It is used to sharpen the edges of steel tools and implements through grinding and honing.

entries.name: Whip
entries.description:
A tensile lash made of leather, cord, or chain which can lash out at nearby enemies, dealing lacerations and harrying them from a distance.

Finesse. When making an attack with a finesse weapon, you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.

Reach. This weapon adds 5 feet to your reach when you attack with it. This property also determines your reach for opportunity attacks with a reach weapon.

entries.name: 목세공사의 도구(Woodcarver's Tools)
entries.description: 이 특별한 도구들은 무언가 만들거나 거래할 때 필요한 것입니다. 장인의 도구에 대한 숙련을 지니고 있으면, 제작시 능력 판정에 숙련 보너스를 더할 수 있습니다. 장인의 도구들은 각각 다른 숙련이 필요합니다.

entries.name: Yklwa
entries.description:
A short wooden shaft topped with a steel or stone blade which balances reach, flexibility, and slashing power in combat.

Thrown. If a weapon has the thrown property, you can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack. If the weapon is a melee weapon, you use the same ability modifier for that attack roll and damage roll that you would use for a melee attack with the weapon. For example, if you throw a handaxe, you use your Strength, but if you throw a dagger, you can use either your Strength or your Dexterity, since the dagger has the finesse property.
